name: Cloud 99
description:
Cloud 99 is a single player text adventure. It was released in two forms, one side of the tape had a pure text adventure version of the game while the version on the other side had graphics.

The game sees the player waking from a dream to find that Jack Frost has been tinkering with the weather and it's the player's job to put things right. Unusually for a text adventure there's an on-screen game clock which runs whether the player is making a move or just sitting there trying to decide what to do next, the clock is there because the game must be completed before dawn comes.

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well U/D for Up and Down
